activities: With regards to personal information received from the EU / EEA and Switzerland, GlowTouch collects personal information through the use of forms that specifically request said information for any number of reasons, including email newsletter sign-ups, event or training registration, content downloads, etc. Personal information collected from the EU / EEA and Switzerland is often limited to email address, name, language, country or location, but may include other information when needed to provide a specific service. On very rare occasions, GlowTouch may collect certain personal information about your computer hardware or software. This information may include IP address, browser type, operation system, domain name, access times and referring web site addresses. This information is used for the operation of the service, to maintain quality of the service, and to provide general statistics regarding use of the GlowTouch website. If, at any time, we are informed of a users’ request to opt out of our system, we will honor said request.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All of the personal data processed by GlowTouch
recoursemech: For organization human resources data: appropriate data protection authorities; For all other data: eTrust Safe Harbor.  In case of a dispute, eTrust is available to you as a third party. In this case you should contact eTrust at http://www.etrust.org/complaint/raise_privacy_complaint.php?url=glowtech.com
